column4: How do I change the icon for xterm so that it shows up on my docky themed gnome-do?
easy way is to change it in the system menu then drag to docky again
and I'd recommend upgrading to docky2 (now a seperate package from gnome-do, you have to add the repositories for it)
Isn't there a way to just change the icon?
i always just change it in my system menu, then redrag to docky
it doesnt use the same icon as your main gnome menu?
it uses a generic launcher icon
but it uses the correct icon in the gnome menu?
how do I change that icon?
then no, it's not copying it
are you using a vector graphic?
try changing it to an icon in /usr/share/icons/hicolor/scalable/apps/
